column1: #Text=Pakku says : " Katara , I want you to have this .
#Text=" Pakku says : " Aang , these scrolls will help you master waterbending .
#Text=But remember , they 're no substitute for a real master .
#Text=Fly straight to the Earth Kingdom base to the east of here .
#Text=General Fong will provide you with an escort to Omashu .
#Text=There , you will be safe to begin your earthbending training with King Bumi .
#Text=" Katara says : " Say hi to Gran - Gran for me !
